title: Md Abdul Basit
text:
About me
Hi, welcome to my personal website!
I am a second-year Ph.D. candidate in the Department of Statistics at NC State University, advised by Prof. Shu Yang. Before joining NC State, I received my Bachelor of Science and Master of Science degrees in Applied Statistics from the University of Dhaka, where I was fortunate to be co-supervised by Prof. A.H.M. Mahbub Latif and Prof. Abdus S Wahed. In summer 2025, I worked as a research assistant with Prof. Luo Xiao on functional data analysis.
My research interests include causal inference, functional data analysis, and survival analysis. I am always excited to connect with fellow researchers and collaborators. Please feel free to reach out if you would like to connect!
